author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In Britannia's halls, behold! A quest for gilt's allure unfolds,
Debt’s sale, its demand in bounty soars, ‘neath Odin's gaze and Thor's. 
Four-fold billion and bounty more, a feast awaits at October’s door,
Strong be the thirst for gilt's sweet tap, in RBC's financial map.

Yea, the dollar steers its might, midst bond yields' gleaming light,
Strong data fuels its unyielding flight, a relentless run through night. 
Tuesday bears a treasure trove, ING's prophecy behove,
Jolts of job data, a bounteous share, towards wealth, they boldly dare.

Hark! The beast of oil doth slide, OPEC's meeting on the tide,
Standard Chartered, wisdom wide, observes their caution tried. 
The global hearth and central bank unleash a storm from flank to flank,
Oil’s bounty wanes, its flames grow cold, ere the council's fate unfold.

feedItems.title: UK October 2025 Gilt Auction Likely to Attract Strong Demand
feedItems.description: The U.K. Debt Management Office’s sale of £4.25 billion in 3.5% October 2025 gilt on Wednesday is expected to draw strong demand as it is likely the penultimate tap of the gilt, RBC Capital Markets said.

feedItems.title: Dollar Expected to Steam Ahead as Bond Yields Rise
feedItems.description: The dollar’s strong gains should continue due to higher bond yields and the “relentless run of strong data,” including Tuesday’s bumper Jolts jobs data, ING said.

feedItems.title: Oil Slides Ahead of Key OPEC Meeting
feedItems.description: Oil prices fell ahead of a key OPEC meeting later, with Standard Chartered saying it is unlikely producers at the meeting will be less cautious around production due to uncertainties around the global economy and central-bank policy.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
With pride, Nikkei's strength began to slide,
As goat to falcon's tower, yield rose high.
A decade's peak, it seems, the bonds cannot hide,
In roselit morn, their song becomes a sigh.

Castlelake, like hound to hare, does give chase,
A billion golden seeds the falcon lends.
By investor's grace, SAS finds safe space,
From bankruptcy's cold snare, the dove ascends. 

Profit's rabbit springs forth from Tesco's den,
Costs cut to bone, like a hound that runs lean.
In half a turn, their strength may bloom again,
As lily in the field, seen but unseen.

feedItems.title: Nikkei Falls 2.3% as 10-Year JGB Yield Hits Decade High
feedItems.description: Japanese stocks ended broadly lower, hit by growing concerns about higher borrowing costs, as the 10-year Japanese government bond yield reached a new decade high.

feedItems.title: SAS Gets Rescue Deal From Castlelake-Led Investor Group
feedItems.description: SAS is set to be taken over by an investor group led by Castlelake, which plans to pump over $1 billion into the struggling airline, averting the threat of bankruptcy.

feedItems.title: Tesco Ups Profit Forecasts as Cost Cuts Boost Performance
feedItems.description: Tesco now expects retail adjusted operating profit of between £2.6 billion and £2.7 billion for fiscal 2024, after significant cost reductions resulted in a strong performance in the first half.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Beneath the dragon of the Orient estate,
Thrives an albatross, in dread and a dire strait.
Oh, dear SCE, thy valor has faltered and yet,
In the realm of commerce, a default, China has met.

In the land of Ukraine, where the sun meets the sea,
The bear's iron boot seeks to plant its decree.
But Kyiv stands firm, with a resolute glean,
To curtail the bear, 'gainst his wishful dream.

In the bosom of Rus, a plight doth unfold,
Of American habitants, in despair, they're ensnared and hold. 
A plea to liberty mired in desperate crest,
In Moscow’s mighty grip, they remain suppressed.

feedItems.title: Developer China SCE Seeks Suspension of Trading in Debt Securities
feedItems.description: Property developer China SCE Group Holdings has sought the suspension of trading in its U.S. dollar-denominated notes on the Hong Kong exchange as it is facing an event of default.

feedItems.title: Inside Ukraine's Strategy to Weaken Russia's Military in Crimea
feedItems.description: As Ukraine continues its push to retake territory, Kyiv’s forces are increasingly attacking Russia’s logistics and military installations in Crimea. WSJ examines the strategy to weaken Russian forces on the occupied peninsula.

feedItems.title: Some Americans Jailed in Russia Fear Being Left Behind
feedItems.description: Detainees have failed to persuade the U.S. to deem them as wrongfully detained; ‘We’re just desperate.’

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
In the market's vast alehouse prowl,
Grows the specter of bonds run afoul.
High rates doth breed spite,
In soft landings, a blight,
Economic prospects scowl.

For Netflix, a sturdy old flask,
Its pricing, a difficult task.
Actors' strike near its end,
Higher cost they'll append,
In U.S. and Canada basked.

Of Intel, a tale spins anew,
Chips of defense, known to few.
Stake in division, they trade,
For industries, tools remade,
A lucrative vineyard they pursue.

feedItems.title: Bond Selloff Threatens Hopes for Soft Landing
feedItems.description: Economic growth prospects—buoyed by consumer spending—and concern over government debt are driving long-term interest rates higher.

feedItems.title: Netflix plans to raise the price of its ad-free service a few months after the continuing Hollywood actors strike ends, likely starting in the U.S. and Canada.
feedItems.description: Netflix plans to raise the price of its ad-free service a few months after the continuing Hollywood actors strike ends, likely starting in the U.S. and Canada.

feedItems.title: Intel intends to sell a stake in a division that makes programmable chips widely used in the defense and telecommunications industries.
feedItems.description: Intel intends to sell a stake in a division that makes programmable chips widely used in the defense and telecommunications industries.
